column5: Our home is located in a safe, quiet neighborhood, minutes away from Baylor Scott & White Hospital. Our guest room features a queen bed, closet/dresser space, and an air mattress if needed.   You will be more than welcome to use the kitchen, living room, and fenced in backyard. Wifi will be accessible to all guests. Coffee, tea, and breakfast will be provided in the mornings.  We do have two friendly cats but they are not allowed in the bedroom or bathroom
